md:
giải nghĩa từ "inattentive" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Inattentive (adjective):
	+ Meaning: Not paying attention; careless; negligent.
	+ Vietnamese: Không chú ý; cẩu thả; bất cẩn.
	+ Example sentence: "The inattentive driver caused the accident."
	+ Related words: careless, negligent, distracted, absent-minded.
	+ Antonyms: attentive, careful, vigilant, mindful.

Note: The antonyms of "inattentive" are words that describe someone who is paying attention, being careful, and being mindful of their actions.

  • Inattentive (adjective):

    • Example sentence: "The inattentive driver caused the accident."

Note: The antonyms of "inattentive" are words that describe someone who is paying attention, being careful, and being mindful of their actions.
